syntax: AMORLINC(cost, date_purchased, first_period, salvage, period, rate, [basis])

arguments.name: Date_purchased
arguments.description: The date of the purchase of the asset.

arguments.name: First_period
arguments.description: The date of the end of the first period.

arguments.name: Salvage
arguments.description: The salvage value at the end of the life of the asset.

arguments.name: Basis
arguments.description: The year basis to be used.
